JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a Product Specialist to join the Product Operations team. Product Operations’ mission is to be the experts on functional quality to improve product teams’ ability to resolve user issues. We believe that every user interaction should work well so those who join our teams are very passionate about solving people's issues and are strong advocates for the Facebook community. We need influencers who can align cross-functional partners to ensure the best possible experience for our platforms. If you like helping people, Product Operations is for you.The Product Operations team fuels product quality and engagement by analyzing user issues at scale and advocating for their resolution. As a Product Specialist, you will be responsible for analyzing the quality and stability of a specific Facebook product. You will leverage data analysis and multiple sources of user feedback to identify user experience themes, prioritize issues, and communicate key takeaways to product, engineering, design, and other cross-functional partners to shape product direction.
